description.value:
Requirements Your last action was a successful Strike, and either you have a hand free or your Strike used a grapple weapon.

You grab your foe while it's distracted by your attack. The foe you hit becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed], as if you had succeeded at an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Grapple] the foe.
